text: Christijan Albers () (born April 16, 1979 in Eindhoven) is a Dutch racing driver. After success in the DTM he drove in Formula One from until the 2007 British Grand Prix, shortly after which he was dropped by his Spyker F1 team. In 2008, he returned to the DTM-series as a driver for the Audi Futurecom TME- team. == References == Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Eindhoven
title: Christijan Albers
